vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Est.9.7;
son of: Haman (H2001);
brother of: Parshandatha (H6577), Aspatha (H0630), Poratha (H6334), Adalia (H0118), Aridatha (H0743), Parmashta (H6534), Arisai (H0747), Aridai (H0742) and Vaizatha (H2055)
§ Dalphon = "dripping"
the second of the 10 sons of Haman
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
達分 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "水滴"
哈曼十個兒子中的老二 (斯 9:7)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
达分 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "水滴"
哈曼十个儿子中的老二 (斯 9:7)
